name: Jadoye Fekr Company
title: website
summary: Jadoye Fekr’s website is built with a fully responsive design, ensuring compatibility across various devices such as smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers. The site incorporates advanced front-end development components for a seamless user experience.
explain:
Jadoye Fekr’s website is built with a fully responsive design, ensuring compatibility across various devices such as smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers. The site incorporates advanced front-end development components for a seamless user experience.

Created a project in 2014 with multi-language support and observance HTML5 & CSS3 standards.

Project features:

- Responsive design

- Multi language

- Customize SEO

- Manage users, programs, slideshow
